author: Kiri Wagstaff and Claire Cardie
title: Clustering with Instance-level Constraints

Talavera and B#ejar (1999), for example, use this model to place instances from the mushroom UCI (Blake & Merz, 1998) data set into either a poisonous" or an edible" cluster.
